customer_service.name: Customer Service
customer_service.description: Order tracking, returns, inventory checks, and support tools

function.name: track_order
function.description: Track the status and location of a customer order by order ID or tracking number

function.name: process_return
function.description: Initiate a return or exchange for a purchased item

function.name: check_inventory
function.description: Check if a product is available in store or for delivery in a given area

store_id.description: Store ID to check (optional, checks all nearby if omitted)

zip_code.description: ZIP code for delivery availability check

function.name: apply_coupon
function.description: Apply a coupon or promotional code to an existing order or cart

order_id.description: Order ID to apply coupon to (optional for cart)

function.name: contact_support
function.description: Escalate issue to human support agent with context summary

summary.description: Brief description of the issue for the agent

sample_queries: Where is my order ORD-2026-8891234?
I want to return the headphones from my last order, they're defective
Is the Samsung 65-inch TV available at store 4215?
Apply coupon code SAVE20 to my cart
I need to speak to someone about a billing issue

inventory_management.name: Inventory Management
inventory_management.description: Stock levels, reordering, warehouse transfers, and pricing tools

function.name: check_stock
function.description: Check current stock levels for a product across stores and warehouses

function.name: reorder_product
function.description: Create a purchase order to restock a product from supplier

function.name: warehouse_transfer
function.description: Transfer inventory between warehouses or from warehouse to store

function.name: scan_barcode
function.description: Look up product details by barcode (UPC/EAN)

function.name: price_lookup
function.description: Look up current and historical pricing for a product

sample_queries: What's the stock level for SKU-TV-SAM65 across all warehouses?
Reorder 500 units of SKU-PAPER-A4 with expedited shipping
Transfer 200 units of SKU-DETERGENT from warehouse WH-05 to store ST-4215
Look up barcode 012345678905 with pricing
Show me the price history for SKU-LAPTOP-HP15

analytics.name: Business Analytics
analytics.description: Sales reports, demand forecasting, trend analysis, and customer insights

function.name: sales_report
function.description: Generate a sales report for a given time period and category

function.name: trend_analysis
function.description: Analyze sales trends and identify top/bottom performers

top_n.description: Number of top/bottom items to return

function.name: competitor_pricing
function.description: Compare product pricing against competitors

competitors.description: List of competitor names to check

function.name: forecast_demand
function.description: Forecast product demand for upcoming period based on historical data

function.name: customer_segments
function.description: Retrieve customer segmentation data and demographics

sample_queries: Show me the electronics sales report for last month in the southeast region
What are the top 10 trending products by revenue in grocery over the last 30 days?
Compare pricing of SKU-TV-SAM65 against competitors
Forecast demand for SKU-PAPER-A4 over the next 30 days with seasonality
Show customer segments by loyalty tier in the midwest

merchant_analytics.name: Merchant Analytics
merchant_analytics.description: Complete merchant dashboard with 100 tools covering GMV, orders, products, customers, inventory, marketing, and finance

function.name: gmv_summary
function.description: Get total Gross Merchandise Value (GMV) for a time period with breakdown by channel

function.name: revenue_by_channel
function.description: Break down revenue across sales channels (website, app, marketplace, social commerce)

function.name: revenue_by_category
function.description: Break down revenue by product category with units sold and margins

top_n.description: Number of top categories to show

function.name: daily_sales
function.description: Get daily sales data including orders, revenue, and units for a date range

compare_previous.description: Compare with same period in previous year

function.name: hourly_sales
function.description: Get hourly sales distribution to identify peak selling hours

function.name: revenue_trend
function.description: Analyze revenue trend over time with growth rate and moving averages

function.name: aov_analysis
function.description: Analyze Average Order Value (AOV) trends, distribution, and factors

function.name: revenue_by_payment_method
function.description: Break down revenue by payment method (UPI, cards, COD, wallets, EMI)

function.name: refund_summary
function.description: Get refund and chargeback summary with reasons and amounts

function.name: net_revenue
function.description: Calculate net revenue after returns, refunds, discounts, and platform fees

function.name: revenue_forecast
function.description: Forecast revenue for upcoming period based on trends and seasonality

function.name: revenue_comparison
function.description: Compare revenue across two time periods (e.g., this month vs last month)

function.name: seasonal_revenue
function.description: Analyze revenue patterns for seasonal events (Diwali, Black Friday, festivals)

compare_years.description: Number of previous years to compare

function.name: revenue_by_geography
function.description: Revenue breakdown by state, city, or pin code with heatmap data

function.name: top_revenue_days
function.description: Get the highest revenue days in a period with contributing factors

top_n.description: Number of top days to return

function.name: order_status
function.description: Look up the current status of a specific order

function.name: order_search
function.description: Search orders by customer email, phone, product, or date range

function.name: order_volume
function.description: Get order volume metrics (total orders, average per day, peak hours)

function.name: order_fulfillment_rate
function.description: Get fulfillment rate, SLA compliance, and average time to ship

function.name: cancel_rate
function.description: Get order cancellation rate with reasons breakdown

function.name: return_rate
function.description: Get return rate with reasons, refund amounts, and trends

function.name: order_timeline
function.description: Get detailed timeline of an order from placement to delivery

function.name: pending_orders
function.description: List all pending orders that need attention (unshipped, payment pending)

older_than_hours.description: Filter orders older than N hours

function.name: delayed_orders
function.description: List orders that are delayed beyond promised delivery date

function.name: order_by_channel
function.description: Break down orders by sales channel with conversion rates

function.name: bulk_order_lookup
function.description: Look up multiple orders at once by a list of order IDs

function.name: repeat_orders
function.description: Analyze repeat purchase patterns and frequency

function.name: order_value_distribution
function.description: Get distribution of order values (histogram) with percentiles

function.name: cod_vs_prepaid
function.description: Compare Cash on Delivery vs prepaid order metrics

function.name: shipping_performance
function.description: Analyze shipping carrier performance, delivery times, and costs

function.name: top_products
function.description: Get top selling products by revenue, units, or margin

function.name: product_views
function.description: Get product page view counts and view-to-cart conversion

function.name: product_conversion
function.description: Get product conversion funnel (views -> cart -> checkout -> purchase)

function.name: product_ranking
function.description: Get product ranking in category by sales velocity and search position

function.name: slow_movers
function.description: Identify products with declining sales or low turnover

threshold.description: Maximum units sold to qualify as slow

function.name: out_of_stock
function.description: List products currently out of stock with estimated revenue loss

function.name: product_reviews
function.description: Get product review summary with ratings distribution and sentiment

min_rating.description: Filter reviews with minimum star rating

function.name: product_margin
function.description: Calculate product margin after cost, shipping, platform fees, and returns

include_all_costs.description: Include advertising, warehousing, and return costs

function.name: category_performance
function.description: Compare performance across product categories

metrics.description: Metrics to compare (revenue, units, margin, returns)

function.name: product_comparison
function.description: Side-by-side comparison of two or more products on key metrics

product_ids.description: List of product IDs to compare

function.name: new_product_performance
function.description: Track performance of recently launched products vs benchmarks

launched_after.description: Show products launched after this date (YYYY-MM-DD)

function.name: product_return_rate
function.description: Get return rate for specific products with reason analysis

function.name: bundle_performance
function.description: Analyze performance of product bundles and combo offers

function.name: price_elasticity
function.description: Analyze how price changes affect demand for a product

function.name: product_recommendations
function.description: Get AI-powered product recommendations for cross-sell and upsell

function.name: customer_count
function.description: Get total customer count with new vs returning breakdown

function.name: new_vs_returning
function.description: Compare new customer vs returning customer metrics

function.name: customer_ltv
function.description: Calculate Customer Lifetime Value by segment or cohort

function.name: customer_segments
function.description: Get customer segmentation breakdown (RFM, spending tiers, behavior)

include_size.description: Include segment sizes and revenue contribution

function.name: customer_acquisition_cost
function.description: Calculate Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC) by channel

function.name: cohort_analysis
function.description: Run cohort analysis showing retention and revenue by acquisition month

function.name: churn_rate
function.description: Calculate customer churn rate with risk indicators

include_at_risk.description: Include customers at risk of churning

function.name: customer_geography
function.description: Map customer distribution by location with density data

function.name: customer_spending_tiers
function.description: Break down customers by spending tier with revenue contribution

function.name: customer_feedback
function.description: Aggregate customer feedback and reviews with sentiment analysis

function.name: nps_score
function.description: Get Net Promoter Score with trend and verbatim comments

function.name: customer_retention
function.description: Calculate customer retention rate over time

function.name: customer_purchase_frequency
function.description: Analyze how often customers make purchases

function.name: top_customers
function.description: Get top customers by revenue, orders, or lifetime value

function.name: customer_demographics
function.description: Get customer demographic breakdown (age, gender, device, platform)

function.name: stock_levels
function.description: Get current stock levels across all warehouses for a product or category

function.name: low_stock_alerts
function.description: List products approaching or below reorder point

function.name: inventory_turnover
function.description: Calculate inventory turnover ratio by product or category

function.name: stock_value
function.description: Calculate total inventory value at cost and retail price

function.name: reorder_suggestions
function.description: AI-powered reorder suggestions based on sales velocity and lead times

function.name: dead_stock
function.description: Identify dead stock (products with no sales in N days)

no_sale_days.description: Number of days with no sales to qualify

function.name: stock_by_warehouse
function.description: Compare stock distribution across warehouses

function.name: inventory_forecast
function.description: Forecast inventory needs based on demand prediction

function.name: catalog_health
function.description: Audit catalog for missing images, descriptions, pricing issues

function.name: listing_quality
function.description: Score product listings on completeness and SEO quality

function.name: sku_count
function.description: Get total SKU count with active/inactive/draft breakdown

function.name: inventory_aging
function.description: Analyze inventory age distribution and identify aging stock

function.name: stock_transfer_status
function.description: Track status of ongoing inventory transfers between locations

function.name: supplier_performance
function.description: Evaluate supplier performance on delivery time, quality, and cost

function.name: procurement_cost
function.description: Analyze procurement costs and trends by supplier or category

function.name: traffic_overview
function.description: Get website/app traffic overview with sessions, users, and page views

function.name: traffic_sources
function.description: Break down traffic by source (organic, paid, social, direct, referral)

function.name: campaign_performance
function.description: Get marketing campaign performance metrics (impressions, clicks, conversions, ROAS)

function.name: coupon_usage
function.description: Analyze coupon and discount code usage, redemption rates, and revenue impact

function.name: ad_spend_roi
function.description: Calculate return on ad spend (ROAS) by channel and campaign

function.name: seo_ranking
function.description: Get search engine ranking for store and key product pages

function.name: social_media_metrics
function.description: Get social media engagement metrics across platforms

function.name: email_campaign_stats
function.description: Get email marketing stats (open rate, CTR, conversions, unsubscribes)

function.name: referral_performance
function.description: Track referral program performance and top referrers

function.name: landing_page_conversion
function.description: Get conversion rates for landing pages with A/B test results

function.name: search_terms
function.description: Get top search terms on your store with click and conversion data

function.name: bounce_rate
function.description: Get bounce rate by page, source, and device with trends

function.name: session_duration
function.description: Analyze average session duration and pages per session

function.name: cart_abandonment
function.description: Analyze cart abandonment rate with reasons and recovery metrics

function.name: marketing_attribution
function.description: Multi-touch attribution analysis showing which channels drive conversions

function.name: payout_summary
function.description: Get payout summary showing pending, processed, and upcoming payouts

function.name: settlement_report
function.description: Get detailed settlement report with order-level breakdown

function.name: tax_summary
function.description: Get tax collected and payable summary (GST, VAT, sales tax)

function.name: platform_fees
function.description: Break down platform fees, commissions, and charges

function.name: dispute_status
function.description: Check payment disputes, chargebacks, and resolution status

function.name: delivery_partner_performance
function.description: Compare delivery partner performance on speed, cost, and customer satisfaction

function.name: warehouse_utilization
function.description: Check warehouse capacity utilization and storage costs

function.name: sla_compliance
function.description: Check SLA compliance rates for shipping, response time, and quality

function.name: cost_breakdown
function.description: Get comprehensive cost breakdown (COGS, shipping, platform fees, marketing, returns)

function.name: profit_margin
function.description: Calculate profit margin after all costs at store, category, or product level

sample_queries: What's my GMV this month?
Which products are selling the most this week?
Show me my customer retention rate for the last quarter
What's my cart abandonment rate?
How are my delivery partners performing?
What's my return rate and what are the top reasons?
Show me revenue by geography at state level for this month
What's my ad spend ROI across all channels?
Which products are out of stock and how much revenue am I losing?
What's my profit margin by category this quarter?
